data_formats: Widely used file formats (Spreadsheet, JSON, GeoJSON, SHP, GPX, KML, XML, TIFF, MP3, MP4, etc.)
digitaf_data_wp: WP4 - LL and a common AF toolbox
WP2 - Tools for practitioners and farm advisors
name: BRO Bodemkaart
description: The "Bodemkaart" (soil map) describes the soil of the Netherlands to a depth of 1.2 meters, made for a scale of 1:50,000. This model provides information about the spatial distribution of soil types and important characteristics of the soil structure (the soil profile).
data_ownership: Ministerie van Landbouw, Natuur en Voedselkwaliteit
access_barrier: No, direct download/access through a web link
digitaf_data_used: The BRO (basisregistratie ondergrond) Bodemkaart is a soil map of the Netherlands describing the soil profile and geomorphology at a scale of 1:50.000. It is one of the two datasources for the tool "De Juiste Boom op de Juiste Plek" which uses soil characteristics and groundwater level for suggesting suitable tree or shrub species.
feedback_data_info: To which tool(s) does the dataset need to be linked?
